UNGP.rulepick_desc:
Please follow these rules:
 -%s consume cost points
 -%s give cost points
 -%s could only be used once
 -Specialist mode could be activated only if cost points are larger than 0
 -Press SHIFT to switch the information mode/A,D to swap the page
 -Specialist challenges could be activated when the level equals Alpha/Omega.
UNGP.rulepick_warning: You have picked rules, would you like to repick?
UNGP.inheritConfirmInfo0: You will inherit %s credits and about %s blueprints, while blueprints you already acquired or those missed due to not loading some mods doesn't count in that.
UNGP.inheritConfirmInfo1: Please be CAREFUL that you're enabling specialist mode, the difficulty level cannot be changed in this gamecycle!

UNGP.menu:
Welcome to the main menu of UNGP. What would you like to do? 
Check savepoint:  View your savepoint, and you can choose whether to inherit it.
Record savepoint: Save your current game status and overwrite your last savepoint.
UNGP.helpInfo:
This mod enables a multi-gamecycle feature.

After reaching max level, you can record a savepoint (recording your save), which would save your blueprints (except industry blueprints), credits and current gamecycle number.

You can record ONCE for each save, and you can have three savepoints for all of your saves.

In a new campaign game, you have 1 day to check your savepoint, and decide whether to inherit your previous gamecycle or not. If you choose to inherit, by choosing the background, you can get part of the resources of your previous gamecycle and skillpoints. Note that savepoint will not disappear after inheriting, you could inherit it in another save, and only by reaching maxlevel can you record a savepoint again.(You could check the setting file)

Specialist mode can be enabled in any gamecycle for a more customized game!
UNGP.gameStartMessage: You have loaded the UNGP Mod. Would you like to check the savepoint? (you can also use the given ability to call out the UNGP menu)

UNGP_abilities.checkSavepoint_desc:
Activate this ability to open the main menu of UNGP.

You could also press %s + %s to open that menu.

UNGP_rules.challenge_tip_desc3: The challenge prohibits the repick of rules
UNGP_rules.repick_desc: You have the option to repick your rules every cycle. Warning: You may fail the Specialist challenge if you pick other rules.
UNGP_rules.button_details_tooltip: Check effects of all selected rules.
UNGP_rules.button_tips_tooltip: Check extra information of all selected rules.
UNGP_rules.button_feedback_tips: Upload your rules list, and gain %s story points...
UNGP_rules.button_feedback_tips_detailed: Anonymously upload your rules list to the mod's database for investigation and analysis. The relevant code can be found in the mod source code and no other information will be uploaded. Only the original rules will be collected, and the data will be deleted after each mod update. Pressing confirm means you agree to the following statement: I have reviewed the above content in detail and confirmed it is correct.
